DataElement.preferredDefinition: The psychometric properties of a measure including validity and reliability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._The science of measuring "psychological" aspects of a person such as knowledge, skills, abilities, or personality. Measurement of these unobservable phenomena is difficult and much of the research and accumulated art of this discipline is designed to reliably define and then quantify.:A basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Measurement is the determination of the size or magnitude of something.  It is also used ro refer to the result of this act.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

Measurement of these unobservable phenomena is difficult and much of the research and accumulated art of this discipline is designed to reliably define and then quantify.:A basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class.

Concepts.definition: The science of measuring "psychological" aspects of a person such as knowledge, skills, abilities, or personality. Measurement of these unobservable phenomena is difficult and much of the research and accumulated art of this discipline is designed to reliably define and then quantify.
A basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Removed Behavior as OC qualifier per SME consensus. 1/15/09 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Measure Psychometric Properties
ReferenceDocuments.description: Includes internal consistency, test-retest reliability, split half reliability, convergent validity, discriminant validity and predictive validity.

DataElement.changeDescription: Removed Behavior from Long Name and changed alt definition.  Replaced generic VD per SME group consensus. mcooper 1/15/09 4/1/10  Replaced and stored system generated definition as alt def. Added question text per website UI. mcooper
